info.name: Quora.com Without Limit v.5
info.description:
Bypass the need to login.
Use Quora.com without limitation
info.additionalInfo: V.5: - Adaptation to their new (and better) design Should be applied to all variation of URLs of Quora. - Thanks to hacker09: Help Need regexp for Quora.com (for namespace regexp'"XXX") And to tophf, with the good and simple solution: RegEx Help #1476
